thread.title: Brits ordered to pay ‘Brexit charge’ on dream holidays… with one package firm REFUSING to hand over flight details until extra £50pp is paid
thread.title_full: Brits ordered to pay ‘Brexit charge’ on dream holidays… with one package firm REFUSING to hand over flight details until extra £50pp is paid

author: jawford
title: Brits ordered to pay ‘Brexit charge’ on dream holidays… with one package firm REFUSING to hand over flight details until extra £50pp is paid
text:
Opinion ‘HELD TO RANSOM’ Brits ordered to pay ‘Brexit charge’ on dream holidays… with one package firm REFUSING to hand over flight details until extra £50pp is paid 
Mark Warner is one of a number of tour companies ordering holidaymakers to pay up to £50 extra per person Exclusive
